How It Works

How our automated system helps you improve your listening, reading and speaking skills.

You take a free test and submit to system

Test is received by the system, graded and sent back to you

You then receive your graded scripts with possible hints for improvement

Do You Know 75% of Test Takers Fail At Writing?

Thats why we have online markers waiting to mark your scripts

Choose Essay

Take the writing test by choosing an essay topic from the standard essay types which usually increase in difficulty. You are required to finish the test in 60 mins and send for grading.

Online Markers

Your scripts will be sent to professional experts who will point out errors, make corrections and suggest hint for potential improvement

Get Detailed Results

Your scripts is then graded based on the markers corrections. Grades, suggestions for improvements and corrections are sents to you in 3 hours less. You may wish to proceed to the next test if qualified, otherwise you retake the test.

Earn up to #50,000 monthly marking scripts at your leisure.
